title: Triple chocolate fridge cake
ingredients: ['100g (3 1/2 oz) unsalted butter', '225g (8 oz) dark chocolate (70% if possible)', '2 tablespoons golden syrup', '100g (3 1/2 oz) milk chocolate digestive biscuits', '50g (2 oz) white chocolate chunks', '75g (2 1/2 oz) fruit & nut mix with cranberries', '25g (1 oz) mini pink and white marshmallows']
